A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely wonderful film. Filled with moments of pure cinema magic\, for my money anyway. Viewed three times at the cinema\, and got better with each viewing. I can see why some people didn’t like it\, but seemingly for the same reasons I loved it even more. For what it’s worth I rate this as joint third for my favourite Star Wars movies\, along with return of the Jedi. A New Hope sits at 1\, and The Empire Strikes Back sits at 2.
